author: dfs
msg: Changed packaging commands to use 'project' instead of 'Name' as root for filenames.

author: dfs
msg: behavior of PatternMatcherInput matching methods with respect to
anchors (^).  Matches were always being performed interpreting the
beginning of the string from either a 0 or a current offset rather
than from the beginOffset.  Essentially, the beginning of the string
for purposes of matching ^ wasn't being associated with beginOffset.

author: dfs
msg: Changed split method to accept a List argument to which results are
appended rather than create a new Vector each time.  This makes
it easier to reduce memory allocation overheads through the reuse of List

author: dfs
msg: Updated example to use new split method.
